yú

traditional: 燃燒
ránshāo combustion; flaming; kindle
ránliào fuel

traditional: 爆發
bàofā to break out; to erupt; to explode; to burst out

traditional: 組合
zǔhé to assemble; combination

traditional: 開採
kāicǎi to extract ore or other resource from a mine
fángzi house

traditional: 轉向
zhuǎnxiàng change of direction; to change direction
yīlǜ (adj) same; uniform; (adj) all; without exception

traditional: 全會
quánhuì plenary session (at a conference)
zhōngbù middle part; central section

traditional: 顯影
xiǎnyǐng to expose (a photographic plate)
shìwēi to demonstrate (as a protest); a demonstration; a military show of force

traditional: 辦事
bànshì to handle (affairs); to work

traditional: 習題
xítí school work exercises

traditional: 壽命
shòumìng life span; life expectancy

traditional: 攝影
shèyǐng to take a photograph

traditional: 評論
pínglùn comment; to comment on; to discuss; commentary

traditional: 農場
nóngchǎng farm

traditional: 整頓
zhěngdùn to tidy up; to reorganize; to consolidate; to rectify
